name: SimpleK Database File
summary: Learn about .LGC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: SimpleK is used for designing master keys, constructing key cylinders and core pinning, tracking key and key ring issuance, and creating reports. For more information, visit the SimpleK website.

description: Database format used by SimpleK, a master key system and key issuance software program; used by locksmiths as well as security and facility managers.
